Package org.team21.game.controllers

Class ReinforcementTest

java.lang.Object
org.team21.game.models.map.Player
org.team21.game.controllers.ReinforcementTest
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ReinforcementTest extends Player
This class tests the functionalities for Reinforcement phase. It includes tests for starting the next game phase and setting valid reinforcements.
Author:
Tejasvi
